full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BCOM LDAN 'DAS MA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I SNYING PO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS DE SKAD CES BKA' STZAL NAS, TSE DANG LDAN PA SH'A RI'I BU DANG, BYANG CHUB SEMS DPA' SEMS DPA' CHEN PO 'PHAGS PA SPYAN RAS GZIGS DBANG PHYUG DANG, THAMS CAD DANG LDAN PA'I 'KHOR DE DAG DANG, LHA DANG, MI DANG, LHA MA YIN DANG, DRI ZAR BCAS PA 'JIG RTEN YI RANG STE, BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,'PHAGS PA SHES RAB KYI PHA ROL TU PHYIN PA'I SNYING PO RDZOGS SO,, ,,MANGGA LAm, ,)
